metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10841 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: glusterfs is vulnerable to privilege escalation on gluster server nodes. Anauthenticated gluster client via TLS could use gluster cli with--remote-host command to add it self to trusted storage pool and performprivileged gluster operations like adding other machines to trusted storagepool, start, stop, and delete volumes.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
